item.title: the effects of scale on worst-group performance
item.description: I think it’s valuable to be working in the open whenever possible, so I’m going to keep my research notes here. These notes will hopefully be full of good (and bad) ideas, so if someone happens to borrow the right idea and publish on it then I’ll be happy to have a new collaborator for the future. This post contains my research notes as I try to understand how model scaling affects worst-group performance.
